ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim
ygData.msgSnippet: ~~I m currently killing everything in Crushbone (or will be when I make 15) for faction with Storm Guards (dwarven guards in BB and Kaladim s warrior guild)
ygData.messageBody:
~~I'm currently killing everything in Crushbone (or
will be when I make 15) for faction with Storm Guards
(dwarven guards in BB and Kaladim's warrior guild)
Then I'll start turning in the pads/belts for faction.
I don't think this'll help with the merchants....any
help?~~

I think you need to kill goblins in Butcherblock to
get better faction in Kaladim .. you can't turn in
belts or pads in Kaladim until you get better faction
with them. I had a gnome necromancer who couldn't
sell in Kelethin and was KOS in Kaladim ~ she killed
orcs in CB until the elves would sell to her (snobby
wood elves!) and then went to BB and killed gobs until
she was no longer KOS in Kaladim. Hope this helps ..

~Nymue~

=====
Nymue Ce'Nedra
Wood Elf Druid, Cazic-Thule Server
